author: chfast
content: Should I try to fix these python linter issues? https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/pull/502

author: chfast
content:
### Test coverage

I'm updating CI for evmone to report coverage from ethereum/tests and execution-spec-tests with distinct "tags" (called "flags" on codecov).

This will be running automatically. You can get the version of execution-spec-tests used in the `circle.yml`.

E.g. 
- execution-spec-tests: https://app.codecov.io/gh/ethereum/evmone/pull/875/tree/lib/evmone?flags%5B0%5D=execution-spec-tests
- ethereum/tests: https://app.codecov.io/gh/ethereum/evmone/pull/875/tree/lib/evmone?flags%5B0%5D=ethereum-tests
